t: Amazon.com: AQUA CHEMPACS Disinfectant Cleaner, 20 Dissolving Refill Packs : Health & Household
s: Disinfection: To disinfect inanimate, hard, non-porous surfaces use the premeasured packet. Stir gently to form a uniform solution. Apply solution with hand pump trigger sprayer so as to wet all surfaces thoroughly. Allow to remain wet for 10 minutes, then remove excess liquid.
